m1.description: An exceptionally delicious burger with a slice of yummy cheese that would give you an excellent experience

m2.description: A braised beef noodle that's specially hand-made by our chefs that would make you feel at home -- It is cheap too!

m11.description: Refreshing iced coffee made from freshly brewed beans, perfect for a pick-me-up.

m3.description: A drink that would make your brain go brzzzz k-booom zoo wee mama!

m4.description: Delicious pizza with a variety of toppings to satisfy your taste buds.

m12.description: Refreshing and tangy lemonade made from freshly squeezed lemons.

m5.description: Freshly prepared sushi with a unique blend of flavors, a treat for sushi lovers.

m6.description: A juicy and tender steak cooked to perfection, paired with your choice of sides.

m7.description: Classic Italian pasta with a variety of sauces and toppings to satisfy your pasta cravings.

m13.description: A refreshing iced tea with a hint of citrus, perfect for a hot summer day.

m8.description: A stunning platter of assorted sushi rolls, nigiri, and sashimi for a delightful dining experience.

m9.description: Crispy battered fish served with golden fries, a classic British dish you won't want to miss.

m10.description: Authentic Mexican tacos filled with flavorsome meats, fresh veggies, and zesty salsa.
